Html:
I would like to know if the "protected" keyword will be implemented eventually ?
Right now, it doesn't seems to work.

By the way, great job ! I really like TypeScript :D

I'm too think that protected keyword very convenient for better structure of classes. If TypeScript has private and public why not protected?

Hope this will be implemented in future. I think TypeScript has great potential. Thanks.
